channel.title: Adding a command Interface

item.title: Adding a command Interface
item.dc:creator: @redbloodelf2 redbloodelf2
item.description:
@redbloodelf2 wrote:

How do i add a command interface.

I have this

public void commands() { sendQuest("@gre@Evo Scape - Commands", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("::talkon YOURTEXT - repeats a message (for buying/selling)", 8147); sendQuest("::talkoff - turns off message repeater", 8148); sendQuest("::pctime - checks how much time is left in pest contorl", 8149); sendQuest("::pass NEWPASSWORD - changes your password", 8150); sendQuest("::players - view everyone online", 8151); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

But no command for it, i wanted to know what the code is for it

Read full topic
